title: A faithful declaration of Christes holy supper comprehe[n]ded in thre sermo[n]s, preached at Eaton Colledge, by Roger Hutchinson. 1552. Whose contentes are in the other syde of the lefe.
author: Hutchinson, Roger, d. 1555.
publicationDate: 1560 Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ maiestatis per septennium.
publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
